summary: Website for Raavni Agrobyte (OPC) Pvt. Ltd., featuring the Milletmist brand of protein bars and energy products, highlighting women leadership and support for ultra-poor millet farmers
architectural_notes: Focus on brand storytelling and social impact
Target audience: health-conscious consumers interested in sustainable products
known_issues: Raavni Agrobyte logo not appearing in footer section
Hero section buttons 'Explore Our Products' and 'Our Story' not responding to clicks
Typography animation on hero section description text not working as expected
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional portrait of woman in navy blue business suit with office background (barnaliprofressional.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a hero section prominently featuring the Milletmist brand with a tagline emphasizing protein bars and energy products made from millets
Create an 'About Us' section describing Raavni Agrobyte (OPC) Pvt. Ltd. as a women-led organization with all core members being women
Create a products showcase section displaying Milletmist protein bars and energy products with visual product cards
Create a 'Farmer Support Initiative' section explaining the company's support for ultra-poor farmers who produce millet grains

Implement a cohesive visual design with an earthy, organic aesthetic using warm earth tones (terracotta, amber, sage green) and natural textures that reflect millet agriculture, women empowerment, and health-conscious branding
Create a responsive navigation menu with sections for Home, About Us, Products, Farmer Support, and Contact
Render generated product images, hero background, and farmer support visuals as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated

Create a 'Core Team' section component that displays team members of Raavni Agrobyte (OPC) Pvt. Ltd., emphasizing the women-led nature of the organization with individual team member profiles including photos, names, roles, and brief descriptions
Render generated team member profile images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory

Update the text displayed in the top right side of the logo from 'Milletmist' to 'Raavni Agrobyte'

Verify the Raavni logo image path in the Hero component and ensure it renders correctly
Update the Raavni logo to have a transparent background to improve visibility across different sections of the website
Adjust the hero section background image color to improve text visibility while maintaining the current visual concept

Update the contact phone number in the Contact component to +919679650183
Update the visit address in the Contact component to '#A1402, Chandansar, Virar - 401305, Maharashtra'
